text: ‘Nea Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no se ni: Fa saa adetɔ so nhoma yi, nea wɔasɔw ano ne nea wɔnsɔw ano, na fa gu dɔte asuhina mu, sɛnea ɛbɛkyɛ yiye.32.14 fa to asuhina mu sɛnea ɛbɛkyɛ yiye—Krataa a wohuu no asuhina mu wɔ Ɛlefantin ne Kumram (nkurow a ɛdeda Nkyene Po atɔe fam) no dii mfe 2,000 ne akyi a ɛho anka.
